data.message: Hi I'm having trouble merging pages, and apparently this is the only way to get in touch with you! It says that I have to wait for an existing merge to be complete, but there shouldn't be any merges in process. Please reply to my message!

replies.message: Hi Maddy. There are a few steps you'll need to take in order to merge your Pages. First, ensure that whoever is performing the merge is an admin for both Pages. Next, if your Pages have physical locations, make sure the addresses are the same. Lastly, please keep in mind that a Page merge is only available for Pages that represent the same thing, so consider making the Page category the same on both Pages. Once you have taken these steps, you may be able to merge your Pages by following these instructions: http://bit.ly/2o969Ot. -Jessica
Not helpful to my specific issue at all really. Can you please address the error message??
Hi Jessica can you please address my question?
